data.name: Ranryu
data.desc: You can only control 1 "Ranryu". If you control a Spellcaster monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect and sent to the GY: You can target 1 monster with 1500 ATK/200 DEF in your GY, except "Ranryu"; Special Summon it.

card_sets.set_name: 2020 Tin of Lost Memories Mega Pack
